hadiths.text: Narrated Bishr:as above (No. 290) adding: The Prophet (ﷺ) was reclining (leaning) and then he sat up saying, "And I warn you against giving a false statement." And he kept on saying that warning so much so that we said, "Would that he had stopped

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنِ اتَّكَأَ بَيْنَ يَدَىْ أَصْحَابِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever sat in a relining posture
